sentences.en: Their job is to check that none of the signatory countries is cheating on the agreement.
sentences.cn: 他们的工作是检查以确认没有任一签署国违背该协议。

sentences.en: This box must be signed by the Company's authorized signatory.
sentences.cn: 且该栏目应当由公司授权人员签名。

sentences.en: Companies from signatory nations are committed to capping their greenhouse-gas emissions.
sentences.cn: 来自缔约国的企业必须降低温室气体排放量。
